name: EM-1
description:
EM-1 is a 3D arcade style platformer with Parkour elements where players play a robot courier under the employment of SPACE Courier And Transport Services. Run along the walls of buildings to gain momentum while switching to higher elevation with your grappling hook. But don't forget about the deliveries that you need to make along the way.
